# description of data
```{r}
library(HSAUR3)
library(DT)
datatable(pottery)

region <- rep(NA,nrow(pottery))
region[pottery$kiln == 1] = 1
region[pottery$kiln == 2 | pottery$kiln == 3] = 2
region[pottery$kiln == 4 | pottery$kiln == 5] = 3

```

# EDA
```{r}
table(pottery$kiln)
table(region)
library(tidyverse)
apply(X=select(pottery,Al2O3:BaO),2,FUN=function(x){summary(x)})
plot(select(pottery,Al2O3:BaO), pch=19, col=region)
library(GGally)
ggcorr(select(pottery,Al2O3:BaO),label = T, label_size = 3, label_round = 2)
```

# PCA
```{r}
std.data <- scale(select(pottery,Al2O3:BaO))
pc.out <- prcomp(std.data)
summary(pc.out)
plot(pc.out,type="l")
```
